entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
